amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules that improve the employment, retention, and wages of workforce participants, especially those with significant barriers to employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 115-1 to exempt rules that improve the employment, retention, and wages of workforce participants, especially those with significant barriers to employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
